name: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible II
name_original: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible II
description:
Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible II is a RPG game developed by Multimedia Intelligence Transfer. It came out on 16-04-1999. It was published by Atlus.
Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible II is available on Game Boy Color.
It was scored by Hiroyuki Yanada, Iwao Mitsunaga and Manami Matsumae.
